description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Argo Rollouts deployment to help monitor your system.
title: Argo Rollouts Overview

definition.content: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Argo Rollouts deployment to help monitor your system.

**Refer to the following resources for more information**

- [Datadog Argo Rollouts documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/argo_rollouts/)

- [Available Argo Rollouts metrics](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/argo_rollouts/#metrics)
This is an overview of service checks, monitors and connect statuses of your Argo Rollouts rollouts.
The Rollout Overview offers a high-level summary of the progress of rollouts by displaying the current phases in which a rollout is currently.

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:argo_rollouts.rollout.info{$host AND (phase:completed OR phase:progressing) AND $argo_rollouts_name AND $argo_rollouts_namespace} by {host,phase,argo_rollouts_name,argo_rollouts_namespace}.fill(null).rollup(max)

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:argo_rollouts.rollout.info{$host AND (phase:error OR phase:invalidspec OR phase:timeout OR phase:abort) AND $argo_rollouts_name AND $argo_rollouts_namespace} by {host,phase,argo_rollouts_name,argo_rollouts_namespace}.fill(null).rollup(max)

definition.title: Rollouts Error, InvalidSpec, Timeout or Aborted

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:argo_rollouts.rollout.info{(phase:error OR phase:invalidspec OR phase:paused OR phase:timeout OR phase:abort) AND $argo_rollouts_name AND $argo_rollouts_namespace} by {argo_rollouts_name,argo_rollouts_namespace,phase,host}.fill(null).rollup(max)

definition.content: Replica Overview gives insight in the number of replicas that were involved in rollouts.
The Analysis and Experiment metrics provide insights into the outcomes and performance of the analyses and experiments that Argo Rollouts conducts to facilitate progressive delivery.

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:argo_rollouts.analysis.run.info{$host AND $argo_rollouts_name AND $argo_rollouts_namespace AND (phase:pending OR phase:running or phase:successful)} by {host,argo_rollouts_namespace,argo_rollouts_name,phase}.fill(null)

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:argo_rollouts.analysis.run.info{$host AND $argo_rollouts_name AND $argo_rollouts_namespace AND (phase:inconclusive OR phase:error OR phase:failed)} by {host,argo_rollouts_namespace,argo_rollouts_name,phase}.fill(null)

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:argo_rollouts.experiment.info{$host AND $argo_rollouts_name AND $argo_rollouts_namespace AND (phase:pending OR phase:running or phase:successful)} by {host,argo_rollouts_namespace,argo_rollouts_name,phase}.fill(null)

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:argo_rollouts.experiment.info{$host AND $argo_rollouts_name AND $argo_rollouts_namespace AND (phase:inconclusive OR phase:error)} by {host,argo_rollouts_namespace,argo_rollouts_name,phase}.fill(null)

definition.content: Argo Rollouts Reconciliation metrics provides insights into the performance of deployment operations.
Argo Rollouts is Golang based. The below metrics display Go runtime metrics that can help troubleshoot performance or bottleneck issues.
Argo Rollouts Logs gives near real-time insight on rollout progression through Kubernetes Pod logs.
